1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that his maternal aunt Maimunah said:"The Messager of Allah and I used to take bath from a single vessel

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ وَالْمَرْأَةِ يَغْتَسِلاَنِ مِنْ إِنَاءٍ وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: A man and woman taking bath from a single vessel
